title: FBI support for 2014 Netflix show "True Detective," Season 1

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documents pertaining to collaboration between the Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) and the production of the 2014 HBO series "True Detective," season 1 (2014), created by Nic Pizzolatto. Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of the FBI and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "True Detective," season 1, including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Washington Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The final document describing the investigation and resulting discipline (such as a Loudermill document or case summary memo) for internal investigations into former Kennewick Police Officer Jared Campbell

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Rose Terse

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documents pertaining to collaboration between the Federal Bureau of Investigation and the production of the 2024 movie "Longlegs," directed by Osgood Perkins and starring Nicolas Cage. I request any and all documents pertaining to FBI involvement with the production of "Longlegs." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of the FBI and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "Longlegs," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.

I am the Director of Research Operations at a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization called The Decoding Culture Foundation. These documents will be used for public education and research purposes. I therefore request a waiver of all fees that may otherwise apply. Attached is a document with organization letterhead confirming my position, as well as the organization's 501(c)(3) application and approval form.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Brett Carollo

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: CIA support for 2009 film "The Box"
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

All documents pertaining to collaboration between the Central Intelligence Agency (CIA) and the production of the 2009 movie "The Box," directed by Richard Kelly and starring Cameron Diaz. I request any and all documents pertaining to CIA involvement with the production of "The Box." Such documents may include but should not be limited to: script notes; production assistance agreements; and all records of communications between employees of the CIA and members of the cast, crew, and production company of "The Box," including memos, notes of meetings and conference calls, emails, and other forms of communication.
